entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 7:08 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
